ModMetaData.name: The Firm
ModMetaData.author: Trokare
ModMetaData.description:
Introducing a new industrial lawless faction : the Firm
The Firm is a interplanetary conglomerate of free minded entrepreneurs ready to take the risks inherent to setting their sight on lawless Rimworlds in the hope of earning matching profits.
The Firm is specialised in providing sub-contractors and consultants, selling medical and recreation medicine treatments as well as providing settlements with high quality and reliability security equipments.
[Author's word :] This is a mod I made for fun and to learn modding, trying to create an industrial/lawless faction with more character than the vanilla factions that are basically random and uninspired.
The Firm's pawns are hand picked to fit the theme : apparel, weapons, traits, bionics etc. etc.
As such, beware, they are more effective than raiders from vanilla : you won't find a god-like brawler/though/melee16 pawn armed only with a crappy bow.
You won't necessarily have to fight them : If you're an industrial/spacer faction, the Firm will consider you potential customers and send you traders, it's only if relationship degrade that you're going to be raided.
But if you're a tribal faction, they may send recruiters to invite you to join modern civilisation and become a productive member of society.
This mod also include : - Integration with Vanilla Expended team's mods as it was inspired by the core apparel, weapon and armour modules. - Several custom settlement map for the faction : weapon workshops, education facilities, headquarters of the firm etc. etc. - Pawns hard to recruit and enslave because snitches get stitches, most of the time you're better of killing them outright or sending them back to the firm for goodwill. - A trader and a trade ship because the Firm is all about sweet, sweet profits.
[h1]Mods supported/recommended on top of the required mods list:[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2288125657]Vanilla Achievements Expanded[/url] : a bunch of achivements for dealing with The Firm. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2149755445]Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids[/url] : using riot armors and shields for HR employees [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2521176396]Vanilla Apparel Expanded - Accessories[/url] : using some of the belts introduced [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2194472657]Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Grenades[/url] : using grenade belt as a secondary weapon for elite troups [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2454918139]Vanilla Weapons Expanded - Frontier[/url] : Additional coilguns introduced in this mod.
[h1]How to report errors:[/h1] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
